name: Duke Nukem Episode 3: Trapped in the Future
name_original: Duke Nukem Episode 3: Trapped in the Future
description:
Duke Nukem Episode 3: Trapped in the Future is a game developed by Apogee Software. It came out on 01-01-1991. Apogee Software published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Duke Nukem Episode 3: Trapped in the Future on PC.
